aoaProcHWA DPU External Functions
aoaProcHWA DPU External

The section has a list of all the exported API which the user need to invoke in order to use the aoaProc DPU. More...

Detailed Description

The section has a list of all the exported API which the user need to invoke in order to use the aoaProc DPU.

Function Documentation

int32_t DPU_AoAProcHWA_config ( DPU_AoAProcHWA_Handle  handle,
DPU_AoAProcHWA_Config *  aoaHwaCfg 
)

Description
The function is AoAProcHWA DPU configuration function. It saves buffer pointer and configurations including system resources and configures EDMA for runtime range processing.

Precondition
DPU_AoAProcHWA_init() has been called
Parameters
[in]handleAoAProcHWA DPU handle
[in]aoaHwaCfgPointer to AoAProcHWA configuration data structure
Return values
Success- 0
Error- <0

DPU_AoAProcHWA_Cmd  cmd,
void *  arg,
uint32_t  argSize 
)

Description
The function is AoAProcHWA DPU control function.

Precondition
DPU_AoAProcHWA_init() has been called
Parameters
[in]handleAoAProcHWA DPU handle
[in]cmdAoAProcHWA DPU control command
[in]argAoAProcHWA DPU control argument pointer
[in]argSizeAoAProcHWA DPU control argument size
Return values
Success- 0
Error- <0

Definition at line 2267 of file aoaprochwa.c.

int32_t DPU_AoAProcHWA_deinit ( DPU_AoAProcHWA_Handle  handle)

Description
The function is AoAProcHWA DPU deinitialization function. It frees up the resources allocated during initialization.

Precondition
DPU_AoAProcHWA_init() has been called
Parameters
[in]handleAoAProcHWA DPU handle
Return values
Success- 0
Error- <0

Definition at line 2364 of file aoaprochwa.c.

DPU_AoAProcHWA_Handle DPU_AoAProcHWA_init ( DPU_AoAProcHWA_InitParams *  initParams,
int32_t *  errCode 
)

Description
The function is AoAProcHWA DPU initialization function. It allocates memory to store its internal data object and returns a handle if it executes successfully.

Parameters
[in]initParamsPointer to initialization parameters
[in]errCodePointer to errCode generates from the API
Return values
Success- valid AoAProcHWA handle
Error- NULL

Definition at line 1748 of file aoaprochwa.c.

uint32_t DPU_AoAProcHWA_process ( DPU_AoAProcHWA_Handle  handle,
uint32_t  numObjsIn,
DPU_AoAProcHWA_OutParams *  outParams 
)

Description
The function is AoAProcHWA DPU process function. It performs CFAR detection using HWA

Precondition
DPU_AoAProcHWA_init() has been called
Parameters
[in]handleAoAProcHWA DPU handle
[in]numObjsInNumber of detected objects by CFAR DPU
[in]outParamsDPU output parameters
Return values
Success= 0
Error!= 0
